alert.note: Alert for Blanco; Gillespie (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 9:55PM CDT until May 19 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN BLANCO AND NORTHEASTERN GILLESPIE COUNTIES... At 955 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Willow City, or 10 miles northeast of Fredericksburg, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Stonewall, Hye, Eckert, Sandy, Willow City, LBJ State Park and LBJ National Historical Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
